boardgame.name: Catan Geographies: Germany
Die Siedler von Catan: Deutschland-Edition
boardgame.description: Germany was founded in 1949 and reunited in 1989. Therefore, the year 2009 will be Germany's 60th birthday and the 20th Anniversary of the Reunion._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Klaus Teuber and the Kosmos Verlag wanted to do something special for this event and will bring out this gorgeous version of their Catan game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It will feature a map of Germany, designed by Michale Menzel, and some slightly simplified rules. You will be able to build city landmarks as for example the 'Brandenburger Tor' or the 'Dresdner Dom' in one of the 12 possible cities. All these landmarks will be in the box as plastic miniatures of significant detail._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In short: A must have for all German Catanien and a good addition to the collection of every other wood-for-sheep-enthusiast._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On the box: Discover and settle germany!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Explore and settle the storied land of Germany using the elegant, award-winning game design from The Settlers of Catan. Here, you will find great social interaction, simple rules, beautiful German geography, rich history and lore, and 12 wonderfully-sculpted landmarks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Catan Geographies: Germany is a game about trade, building, and settlement. Start with town halls in 3 cities. Then build roads to neighboring cities, where you can purchase landmarks and new town halls. Town halls create resource production, while the unique landmarks generate special awards. Both yield victory points - as do the Longest Road, Largest Army, and historically-based victory point cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;So, have fun with friends or family while casually discovering the novel geography and history of Germany._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Only the limited tin miniatures! (limited to 500)
Impressive new addition to the Settlers line-up, with fabulous landmark miniatures. Game in in EXCELLENT condition. Mayfair version.

This listing is for the LIMITED EDITION PEWTER BUILDINGS and a shrinkwrapped copy of the Kosmos edition of the game! As a bonus it also includes the leather-style Dice Cup as seen here: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/image/388634/catan-geographies-germany Only 500 of these limited edition building sets were produced, and this one is brand new and unused. See a picture of this set here: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/image/388633/catan-geographies-germany The set of pewter buildings sells on Catanshop for 69 Euros by itself, and so this price represents an excellent deal for the buildings, the dice cup, and the game. Sadly, I only have one of these to sell, and so it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s first come, first served.
